attributes.additional_details: Many people might know that council offices across the UK have to make big cuts from there budget. Our council run by sir Peter soulsby in Leicester are planning to cut our children's adventure playgrounds, which provide a service across leicester to 100s of children aged 5-16. His plans will mean that we will have a 40 to 50% cut in our budget  this means , we would no longer be Able to give our children the area and service they need . These adventure playground have been around for more that 30 year and have had more that 400.000 kids past thought there door please sign this to show your support and stop the cuts affecting our kids :)
